alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Collier County through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Golden Gate Estates. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Miles City and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
